summary.event: 6th Summer School on Empirical Research Methods in Software Engineering and Informatics (ERMSEI)
summary.location: Centre de recherche INRIA/ IRISA, Rennes, France
summary.goal: To assist junior researchers in starting their empirical work in Software Engineering and Informatics using practical, hands-on exercises.
summary.focus: Overview of empirical research methods, rather than detailed theories, with a strong emphasis on developing participants' own research topics.
summary.exclusions: Will not cover statistics or specialized tools such as R.
